About Chick-Fil-A Chick-Fil-A is a Fast Food restaurant located at 1245 William D Tate Ave in Grapevine, TX 76051. Chick-Fil-A has been described as an Perfect Fast Food restaurant and has received an average rating of 10 by our members. Quick Facts
Cuisine: Fast Food, American, American Accepts Credit Card: Yes Parking: N/A
Atmosphere: N/A Take Reservations: Yes Serves Alcohol: N/A Smoking Allowed: No
User Reviews for Chick-Fil-A
All Reviews for Chick-Fil-A
Anonymous
March 27, 2009
Food
10
Decor
10
Service
10
this place is so horrible, cold food...awful service. i had a delevery one night a while back.. i waited over a hour and a half.. by that time my food still wasnt deleviered. i called them back and they told me the driver had already left. well he showed up 30 mins later. my food was cold and nasty. when i called back and talked to the manager he hung up on me! these people are rude and horrible service. never again will i order from there!
Overall Rating
10
"Perfect"
